trans-unit.source: Represents an <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> property (and the value of the property) of a printing system hardware or software component.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintInt32Property"></xref> class for the specified property.
The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Int32> property of a print system object, including casing.

For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.AveragePagesPerMinute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "AveragePagesPerMinute", not "AveragePPM" or "AveragePagesperMinute".
The name of the <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintInt32Property"></xref> represents.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintInt32Property"></xref> class for the specified attribute and gives it the specified value.
The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Int32> property of a print system object, including casing.

For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.AveragePagesPerMinute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "AveragePagesPerMinute", not "AveragePPM" or "AveragePagesperMinute".
The name of the <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintInt32Property"></xref> represents.
The value of <xref href="System.Object"></xref> the property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintInt32Property"></xref> represents.
Gets or sets the value of the property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintInt32Property"></xref> represents.
The property cannot be set to the value that the calling code provides.
